column2: "Hom mma enuadɔ ntsena hɔ daa."
"Mma hom enyi mmpa ahɔhoyɛ do: na ɔno do na binom nam ayɛ abɔfo a woennhu hɔn dɛm no ahɔho."
"Hom nkaa hɔn a wɔda efiadze no
column3: dɛ dza hom nye hɔn da hɔ
column4: nye hɔn a wohu amandze biara
column5: dɛ homankasa so da ho wɔ honam mu."

column2: "Hom ndzi awar nyi wɔ adze nyina mu
column3: na mma hom nngu awarmpa ho fi: na ndwaman nye awartofo dze

column2: "Mma sika enyiber mmba hom abrabɔ mu. Hom mma hom bo ndwe dza hom wɔ no ara ho: na nankasa aka dɛ
column3: Mirinngya wo da
column4: eso meremmpa wo da biara da."

column2: "Ntsi yɛdze ndam ka dɛ
column3: Ewuradze nye mo boafo; murunnsuro: Nyimpa botum ayɛ me dɛn?"

column2: "Hom nkaa hɔn a wɔhwɛɛ hom do a wɔkaa nyamesɛm kyerɛɛ hom no; hom nhwɛ hɔn abrabɔ ewiei
column3: na hom nsua hɔn gyedzi."

column2: "Jesus Kraest tse dɛmara ndeda
column3: nye ndɛ

column2: "Mma hom mma nkyerɛkyerɛ horow fofor bi mmfa hom nnkyinkyin: na oye dɛ wɔdze adom hyɛ akoma dzen mbom
column3: na nnyɛ edziban a hɔn a wɔnantsew mu ennya mfaso bi no a."

column2: "Yɛwɔ afɔrmbukyia a hɔn a wɔsom ntamadan mu no nnyi kwan dɛ wodzi ho biribi."
"Na mbowa a sɔfopanyin no dze hɔn bɔgyaa kɔ krɔnkrɔnbea mu wɔ bɔn ntsi no
column3: hɔn efun wɔhyew no nseraban no ekyir."

column2: "Ntsi na Jesus so
column3: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ na ɔdze no bɔgyaa atsew ɔman no ho no
column4: ohun amandze wɔ kuropon no ekyir no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mma yempue nkɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ nseraban no ekyir
column3: dɛ yɛso n'adapaabɔ no bi."

column2: "Na yennyi kurow a ɔtse hɔ daa wɔ ha
column3: na mbom dza ɔreba no na yɛhwehwɛ n'ekyir kwan."

column2: "Ɔno ntsi hom mma yendua no do mbɔ ayɛyi afɔr mma Nyankopɔn daa
column3: ɔno nye anofamfa aba a ɔpaa mu bɔ no ne dzin."

column2: "Na mma hom werɛ mmfir adɔyɛ nye adzekyɛ
column3: na dɛm afɔrbɔdze yi na ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi."

column2: "Hom ntsie hom akandzifo na hom mbrɛ hom ho adze mma hɔn: osiandɛ hɔn na wɔweɔn hom akra
column3: na wobobu ho nkontaa; ama wɔdze enyigye aayɛ iyi na nnyɛ nkrumsi bi a: annyɛ dɛm a ɔnnkɛyɛ mfaso ama hom."

column2: "Hom nsɔr mma hɛn: na yɛwɔ awerɛhyɛmu dɛ yɛwɔ tsibowa pa
column3: dɛ yɛpɛ dɛ yɛbɔ hɛn bra yie wɔ adze nyina mu."

column2: "Na mutu hom fo papaapa dɛ hom nyɛ iyi
column3: ama woeegyaa me ama hom ntsɛmara."

column2: "Afei asomdwee Nyankopɔn a ɔnam onnyiewiei ahyɛmu no bɔgyaa do dze nguan no hɔn hwɛfo kɛse
column3: mekyerɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest
column4: fi ewufo mu baa bio no
column6: "ɔmma hom ndzi mu wɔ edwuma pa nyina mu
column8: na ɔmfa Jesus Kraest do nyɛ hɛn mu dza ɔsɔ n'enyi
column9: ɔno na enyimnyam nka no mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."

column2: "Na mutu hom fo
column3: enuanom
column4: hom ntsie afotusɛm yi: na makyerɛw nsɛntsia bi amona hom."

column2: "Hom nhu dɛ woegyaa hɛn nua Timoti; na sɛ ɔba ntsɛm a
column3: menye no bɛba ebohu hom."

column2: "Hom nkyiakyia hɔn a wɔhwɛ hom do no nyina
column3: nye ahotseweefo no nyina. Hɔn a wofi Itali no kyiakyia hom."

column2: "Adom nka hom nyina. [Amen.]"
